customs-clearance.name: Customs Clearance Services
pain_points: Backdated financial exposure: Incorrect duty and tax calculations can lead to significant penalties during retroactive customs audits.
Improper classification risks: Misidentifying goods (e.g., flotation devices vs. life jackets) can lead to legal litigation and seized shipments.
FCA Violations: Penalties for negligence can range from double the duty loss to triple the value of underpaid duties plus individual violation fines.
operational_requirements: Commercial Invoice and Packing List for value and quantity verification.
Country of Origin certificates to determine preferential tariff eligibility.
Denied Party Screening results to ensure compliance with international trade sanctions.
customs-clearance.value_logic: Automated tools often fail to flag prohibited items or nuanced restricted goods. Professional clearance ensures that every entry is audit-ready and minimizes the risk of backdated duty assessments that SaaS tools cannot defend.

hs-code-classification.name: HS Code Tariff Classification
pain_points: Composition Complexity: Section VI (Chemicals) and Section XVI (Machinery) contain thousands of subheadings where small material differences change the tariff rate.
GRI Compliance Failures: Failure to apply the General Rules for Interpretation (GRI) in the correct strict order leads to systemic classification errors.
Seizure of Goods: Customs authorities can lose trust in importers who consistently misclassify, leading to 100% inspection rates and warehouse demurrage.
operational_requirements: Technical Data Sheets (TDS) or Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS) for chemical compositions.
Engineered drawings or functional descriptions for machinery and mechanical parts.
Historical classification rulings (CBP Cross Rulings) for consistent legal precedent.
hs-code-classification.value_logic: AI classification tools struggle with 'form vs. function' nuances in complex machinery. Expert classification applies legal precedent and deep material science to ensure the lowest legal duty rate while maintaining 100% compliance.

trade-compliance.name: Trade Compliance Consulting
pain_points: Regulatory Volatility: Trade laws and sanctions change weekly; static internal policies lead to accidental illegal exports.
Loss of Import Privileges: Severe or repeat non-compliance can result in the permanent revocation of a company's ability to import or export.
Supply Chain Demurrage: Compliance-related delays at the border can cost thousands per day in storage and missed delivery penalties.
operational_requirements: End-Use and End-User statements for sensitive high-tech or dual-use goods.
Comprehensive export/import license history and internal control programs (ICP).
Record-keeping logs for the 5-year statutory retention period required by most jurisdictions.
trade-compliance.value_logic: Generic compliance software provides templates but doesn't handle the 'Informed Compliance' requirements of modern customs authorities. Our experts build custom defensible workflows that protect corporate officers from individual liability.

shipping-logistics.name: Shipping & Logistics Support
pain_points: Demurrage & Detention Spirals: Lack of real-time visibility into rolling cargo and port exceptions leads to thousands in avoidable daily fees.
Retailer Chargebacks: Inaccurate documentation and late arrival notifications trigger heavy financial penalties from major retailers.
Exception Management Failure: Without standardized tracking data, identifying and resolving carrier business rule failures happens too late to save the shipment.
operational_requirements: Real-time tracking data and time-stamped documentation to dispute unfair demurrage charges.
Automated exception alerts integrated with warehouse labor scheduling.
Historical carrier performance audits to evaluate risk and shipment history.
shipping-logistics.value_logic: Standard tracking APIs provide raw data, but professional logistics support provides the smart exception identification needed to dispute fees and optimize warehouse labor before bottlenecks occur.

freight-audit-finance.name: Freight Audit & Financial Processing
pain_points: GL Coding Inaccuracies: Manual processing leads to misallocated transportation spend across mode-level charges (LTL, FTL, Ocean).
Duplicate Billing: WithoutCharge-level automated audits, companies often pay the same carrier invoice multiple times across different departments.
Fuel Surcharge Overcharges: Static auditing fails to catch version-controlled fuel surcharge schedule errors in versioned contracts.
operational_requirements: Version-controlled contract terms, tariffs, and SLAs for automated validation.
CHARGE-LEVELMode-level mode-level modes mode-level charge modes Mode-level Charge level Mode-level mode-level Charge level Charge-level charge audit history.
Integrated ERP/TMS data flows to ensure clean, audit-ready financial statements.
freight-audit-finance.value_logic: Generic accounting software lacks freight-specific logic like detention clauses and dynamic fuel surcharges. Our expert financial processing corrects billing errors at the root cause before they hit the general ledger.
